first_translate: isn’t this uncomfortable for you?
doesn’t it feel awkward?
not at all.
okay then!
make sure your face is covered like that.

hangle: 내 머리색 보다 네 외모가 더 눈에 띌 테니까.
first_translate: your looks will stand out more than my hair color.

hangle: …너 정말 분위기 깨는 데 뭐 있다…
first_translate: you really know how to ruin the mood...
hmm...
the mansion doesn’t look as bad as I thought it would.
I wonder how they manage their monsters.
no idea.
get up!!!
come on, hit him harder!
move,
march!
this isn’t good.
it’s dangerous.
hey, you idiot!
I-I’m your trainer!!!

hangle: 관리가 안 되는걸 보아하니 조만간 큰 사고가 터지겠는데.
first_translate: if he can’t control them anymore, something terrible might happen soon.
fiona.
this place is bigger than we expected.

hangle: 그리고 정체가 짐작 가는 귀족이 몇 명 보여.
first_translate: and there are some nobles here whose identities I think I recognize.

hangle: 헤일론과 네 휘하의 기사단만으로 뒤집기는 힘들까?
first_translate: do you think house haylon and our guards alone won’t be enough to take down everyone inside?
well... if we only arrest people,

hangle: 혼란 속에서 운 나쁘게 마물이 풀린다면 위험하겠지.
first_translate: then yes, but things could get complicated if any monsters escape during the chaos.
that makes sense...

hangle: 게다가 시그렌과 헤일론 가문, 둘이서만 협조했다가는 꼭 뒷말이 나오겠지.
first_translate: besides, if houses haylon and sigren work together without anyone else involved, rumors may spread about us afterward.

hangle: 깔끔하게 처리하려면 중립 귀족을 끌어들이는게 좋을까?
first_translate: to avoid complications, do you think we should involve neutral noble families too?
fiona, over there.
it's the crown prince.
where?! I don’t see him.
where?! I don’t see him.
lower.
he just went into one of those rooms...
ah, right there.
why did he go inside?
no clue...
I doubt it was for anything good though.
hm...
what’s going on? is this everything you have?
how about what you told me last time? where are the higher-level monsters?
my apologies, but--
slow bastard.

hangle: 멍청한 녀석, 그걸 준비하는게 쉬운 줄 알아?
first_translate: stupid fool, do you think preparing such beasts is simple?

hangle: 하지만 황태자가 내 투기장을 마음에 들어 하는 건 정말 천운이지.
first_translate: but still, it’s great luck that his highness likes coming to my arena so much.

hangle: 돈만 좀 주면 투기장이 불법이라는 것도 눈 감아 주니까.
first_translate: as long as I give him money, he’ll turn a blind eye even when he knows these fights are illegal.

hangle: 비위 맞추는 것 정도는 해줄 수 있지!
first_translate: of course I’d want to keep him happy!

hangle: 한시라도 빨리 더 재밌는 걸 준비하겠습니다.
first_translate: I'll prepare something better immediately.

hangle: 생각보다 사업의 규모가 너무 큰 것 같아.
first_translate: the scale of this operation seems larger than we anticipated.
I agree.

hangle: 황태자를 끌어들이면서 사업의 규모가 원작보다 더 커져 버렸어.
first_translate: now that the crown prince has gotten himself involved, it’s become worse than it was in the original story.
I didn’t expect this. I made a mistake.

hangle: 이쯤 되면 정말로 다른 귀족가의 힘을 빌려야겠는데.
first_translate: at this point, we’re definitely gonna need help from other noble families.
but we obviously can’t ask livia for her assistance.
in that case...
is he truly our best option?
good afternoon.

hangle: 피오나 영애가 절 부른 건 실로 의외군요.
first_translate: I never imagined lady fiona would call upon me herself.
yes...

hangle: 진짜로 도움이 될 수 있는게 이놈 뿐이라니…
first_translate: unfortunately, he’s the only person who can actually help us...

hangle: 후작님이 흥미를 가질 만한 사안이 있어서요.
first_translate: I came because I had a matter which I believe would interest you, lord pearl.

hangle: 전 딱히 황자 전하의 편을 들 생각은 없습니다.
first_translate: let me make myself clear first. I am not taking sides with the crown prince.

hangle: 저도 그런 부탁을 할 생각으로 온 건 아닙니다.
first_translate: that wasn’t why I called you either.
then tell me, why exactly did you come here today...?
I hope this meeting turns out interesting.

hangle: 그냥 시간 낭비하기 싫다고 말 하지 그러니.
first_translate: can’t you just say you hate wasting time instead of beating around the bush?

hangle: 후작님, 요즘 재무부를 운영하시는 게 힘들지 않으신가요?
first_translate: has managing the ministry of finance been difficult lately, lord pearl?

hangle: 황제나 황후가 사치가 꽤 심한 편이지.
first_translate: the emperor and empress seem quite extravagant.
everything in life comes with its challenges.
a wise saying indeed.

hangle: 하지만 요즘 후작님을 더 피곤하게 하는 자들이 있는 모양이더군요.
first_translate: but recently, I heard there were others making matters more tiresome for you.
lady fiona...

hangle: 피오나 영애만큼 사교계 화법이 안 어울리는 영애는 처음 봅니다.
first_translate: never before have I seen someone as unskilled at small talk as you.

hangle: 어색하니 그냥 본론을 말씀하시는 걸 추천합니다.
first_translate: since you find it so awkward, I suggest getting straight to the point.

hangle: 어차피 빙빙 돌려 말하는 건 저도 시간 낭비라는 생각이 들고.
first_translate: taking detours feels like a waste of time anyway.
don’t regret this later.
go ahead.
pardon?
so...

hangle: 같이 세금 안 내는 놈들 잡으러 갈래요?
first_translate: want to join forces and catch tax evaders together?

hangle: 전 귀족 영애들에게 정말로 많은 제안을 받았습니다.
first_translate: I’ve received many offers from various ladies until now.
they asked me to watch plays or drink tea with them.
they asked me to watch plays or drink tea with them.
but...

hangle: 지금까지 받았던 제안 중에 제일 마음에 드는 건 이거군요.
first_translate: out of every offer I've ever received, this one is by far my favorite.
